properties.verseOrder: v1 c1 v2 c1 v3 c1 v4 c1 v5 c1 v6 c1

verse.name: c1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}I am coming Lord Coming now to Thee Wash me cleanse me In the blood That flowed on Calvary{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}I hear Thy welcome voice That calls me Lord to Thee For cleansing in Thy precious blood That flowed on Calvary{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Though coming weak and vile Thou dost my strength assure Thou dost my vileness fully cleanse Till spotless all and pure{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}'Tis Jesus calls me on To perfect faith and love To perfect hope and peace and trust For earth and heav'n above{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Tis Jesus who confirms The blessed work within By adding grace to welcome grace Where reigned the power of sin{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: {lang-eng}And He the witness gives To loyal hearts and free That every promise is fulfilled If faith but brings the plea{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v6
verse.lines: {lang-eng}All hail atoning blood All hail redeeming grace All hail the gift of Christ our Lord Our strength and righteousness{/lang-eng}
